Dataset.Name: MTSamples and UPMC Clinical Notes
Dataset.Description: Annotated clinical notes for substance use information: MTSamples (491 history & physical notes) used for development and annotation, and UPMC (200 de-identified notes) used as evaluation set.

AnnotationGuidelines.Description: Annotations included six elements (amount, status, type, frequency, method, temporal) for alcohol, drug, and nicotine use. These were extracted using syntactic rules, dependency parsing, and lexicons from multi-site sources, Propbank, and MiPACQ.
AnnotationGuidelines.Link: No official URL provided in the paper, but annotation tools and resources used include BRAT (http://brat.nlplab.org), GATE (https://gate.ac.uk), PropBank (https://propbank.github.io/), and MiPACQ.
